content: It really depends on who “we” is, doesn’t it? Is “we” the US government? If so, does that mean we’re conferring the benefits U.S. citizenship on 20 million victims of despots, or hey, why not all 7 billion non-US citizens. Is “we” the multitude of charities, mostly religious, that are trying to get in there to help? When I donate to such charities, am I part of the “we”? Or do “we” travel there as individuals and punch out the bad guys?
